FuncDef: This command configures the import mode for the service chaining EVPN service. Theimport-modecontrols the EPVN route types that are imported by the EVPN system.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the service ID of the EVPN. Values-1 to 2147483647.
Specifies the import mode of the EVPN. Values-bridged - The specified EVPN instance imports EVPN route type-2 and type-1 from the peer..
Keyword used to create the EVPN service instance. The create keyword requirement can be enabled or disabled in the environment>create context.
